column3: “one of my new found favs...rolled up a joint and stubbed it out half way..let the high creep in..I made the mistake and stopped the channel surfing on the golf channel...45 mins later I woke up in a puddle of drool..knocked out haha...great bud, Def goes with the mood..if it's a rainy day, your gonna know...but to could go to a park just the same...”

“Thankfully this strain will not send you on a man vs shark boat trip while you're trying to live a peaceful life with your family on Amity Island. Which is sad in a way because it means no sharing stories on a boat. But I digress.

This strain is a real surprise. Hits you hard and fast then drags you with it. I don't find myself passing out while high but this damn near did. I had a bit  before bed and woke up severa...”

“(Super Skunk x White Widow) Old-school stoned;  that is the best way I can describe the smell and effects of this strain.  It is smooth on the lungs, but has a great earthy-hashy mixed with citrus (lemons, tart oranges). Very much a creeper strain ... one minute you think you should hit just a little bit more - and next you can barely remember your own name.  What I'm working with is definitely like a 35/65 sativa/in...”

“A lot of citrus musky and kind of Skunky flavors follow with the strain and also has more like a sea side smell to it.The best way to describe short is that it comes on full blast on the cerebral side it provides me with a lot of stress free and mood swings to be at a very minimum to almost nothing. And also helps me come up with a lot of creative solutions to a lot of the hard Roadblocks  that I have. If you're look...”
“definitely a day time strain. once smoked, felt super energized and wanted to take on the days tasks. not the best for when its time for bed, but still leaves your body super relaxed.”

“If you partake in Gws, then prepare to be eaten by the shark.  The taste is very grapefruit with a high that is quietly strong with absolutely no paranoia.  On the other hand your brain will turn to grape bubblegum and you will become crazed.  (Yes - the reason for the 1950's movie.)    Hp would be a chilled Indica equivalent.  ns”

“Nice fluffy buds that are densely covered with trichomes.  Smells like a berry that was dipped in sugar.  Unbelievable, beyond unique smell.  Smoking taste continues the sweetness with a little more floral bend.  The effects are felt almost immediately, with a gentle buzz behind the eyes and increasing euphoria throughout one's body.  Overal mood changes were noted to be rapid; the sun seemed brighter, colors more vi...”

“I need to locate more of this because I want to put it in my morning blend for antidepressant. Due to a lot of things, I can't take medication for my chronic depression, so this is a great find. I sincerely hope I can find more soon. I need more of this in my life.  This has been the best discovery in AGES. I feel almost almost like I can breathe for the first time in about 3 years at this point. Ugh. GWS, I love you...”

“After a good month of pretty much indica's (couple hybrids) This took me right out of a depressed state while still providing good stress relief. Have to say its been my favourite strain in terms of affecting my anxiety completely settles it!”

“Great strain, smoked a small joint and it got me high for hours. A strong cerebral high followed by a stronger body high. Tastes citrusy, almost lemony and a little earthy and smells like fruit. It made my eyes very dry and red so I wouldn't smoke this if you need to go somewhere important. I would put this bud at a 3.7 - 4.0, Definatley a must try”

“Two or three bong rips sets in motion about a three hour energetic buzz.  Went cycling with friends and enjoyed an enhanced mild psychedelia of exaggerated sensations and perceptual distortions.  Lots of laughter and spontaneous insights.  Time dialation pronounced.  No paranoia.  Great stuff.”
“Don't see how it's a 7.7 only. This bud is awesome”

“This strain is very good for pain. 
It is a fast acting strain with a long lasting heady high.
 It was a sorta kinda heady high, but not completely overwhelming. 
It made me feel Happy.
It made me feel Aroused.
It made me feel Energetic.
It made me feel Focused.
It made me feel Uplifted.
It made me feel Creative.
This strain helped me with Pain.
This strain helped me with Fatigue.
This strain helped me wit...”

“This stuff, well at first it's like a nibble...you feel a little buzz...then a little later it's like BAM! it bites and you, get hit like a train.

DO TRY!”

“This was a surprisingly good strain! I wasn't expecting much the first time I smoked it but wow! Me and my friends smoked this in the woods off of a trail and we're having a blast this is definitley a day time strain.”

“This was probably the best high I've ever had but I also did it around when I first started smoking. I was only focused on what was happening at that moment and didn't even think about anything else such as homework, or whatever. I was so in the moment and had a sick time  with my buddies”

“This was a surprisingly good strain! I wasn't expecting much the first time I smoked it but wow! Me and my friends smoked this in the woods off of a trail and we're having a blast this is definitley a day time strain.”

“This strain ties with mickeys kush for most energizing sativa.
I can't be serious enough when I say this strains very potent. I know a few friends that have bought this then gave it to me because they couldn't stand how strong it was.
I was lucky enough to get this strain in shatter. Even better it was a value strain and thanks to it being my bday I got it discounted another $5.
$10 for a half a gram of GWS shatter. ...”

“This was probably the best high I've ever had but I also did it around when I first started smoking. I was only focused on what was happening at that moment and didn't even think about anything else such as homework, or whatever. I was so in the moment and had a sick time  with my buddies”

“This stuff, well at first it's like a nibble...you feel a little buzz...then a little later it's like BAM! it bites and you, get hit like a train.

DO TRY!”

“This is my favorite day time medicine. The happy factor is amazing, also a VERY effective pain reliever for sciatica and muscle pain!!! 

This is one that I smoke each morning and throughout the day to not hurt; my laundry gets done, I can sit and stand with no pain. It is a life SAVER. I love it.”

“The moment OCS opened I ordered some of Redecan's GWS. I've actually tried this strain once before and deemed it to be one of the greatest Sativa's I'd ever smoked. It's a sneaky strain too. You'll finish your joint/bowl and think this is nothing to write home about, then go about your business, maybe plop yourself down and watch something, then about 20 minutes later you'll come to the sudden realization that your h...”

“It's great allowed me to do self therapy and now I am rocking a higher understanding of my self all day. It's different in the sense that I felt 0% body high it was such a clairvoyance of thought and happy feeling that it just made sense to show my negative side the light it allowed me to truly be free of paranoia and just relax and enjoy who I am and what funk I bring to the world. Really awesome! Depression, Add, M...”

“A Standard Farms WINNER!!!! This is called a HYBRID by Standard Farms, but also mention it’s INDICA like qualities.
This is a GREAT PAIN STRAIN....Loaded with terpenes, Cannabinoids CBG,CBC,CBD.
NOT the tastiest strain....tastes like a Camel cigarette.
What it lacks in flavor it makes up for in performance!!
I’ve taken 6 pulls and my arthritis WAS aggravated due to dampness, that sinus headache is gone, and the broke...”

Really awesome! Depression, Add, M...”

“This uniquely citrus/grapefruity super-(5)star sativa is 💣 & a real powerhouse — ✊! Interesting uptake –> earthy, skunky, smooth, + upon each sweet exhale –> balanced, yet bold euphoric blast!
Within the hour, noticeable diminished pain & both muscle|mental relaxation, to boot. Mood elevating, appetite-inducing, nausea-eliminating + anxiety suppressing, this is DEF a new med-cab mainstay!”
“Awesome taste and smell, turned me very happy, relaxed but at the same time energetic. Giving 4 stars only because it didnt last that long, but very good strain”
“Definitely would recommend. There is a very high sense of euphodia with this.”
“this particular sativa was verry stonie. sativas seem to just tease my appetite  for cannabis but gws is no play around. impressed”
“What a great looking strain and it smokes as smooth as it looks, great for kicking back on a hammock and melting away”

“Would not recommend if you have important errands to run or if you need to be socially coherent. 

There are two components to this high, the rolling body buzz and how quickly it zaps your cognitive processes. 
Which effect you feel first varies from session to session as GWS seems to induce a slightly different high every time.

Experienced users will be delighted with this strain. GWS has a way of catching even the...”

“Would not recommend if you have important errands to run or if you need to be socially coherent. 

There are two components to this high, the rolling body buzz and how quickly it zaps your cognitive processes. 
Which effect you feel first varies from session to session as GWS seems to induce a slightly different high every time.

Experienced users will be delighted with this strain. GWS has a way of catching even the...”
“It's a really clean high it's allot like purple kush except it gives you more energy and helps with pain.”

“When this strain is grown properly, it is primarily white in colour with a lime green accent, it has lengthy amber hairs that obnoxiously stretch throughout the bud reaching a good amount of area. Your eyes fixate on the abundance of trichome as the indubitable aesthetic quality of this strain. A nice whiff gives an inviting smell with a certain sweetness to it. When you break into the bud and squeeze it a bit this s...”
“this shark has some bite and then it turns into the u ok?" shark meme for a second and makes sure you're ok
column4: then takes you on a wild ride through the oceans of your mind.  excellent hybrid. +++”"

column3: “The best taste I've ever had”

“Very pungent burn and slowed me down like jogging through quicksand. My mind was alert, but my body said this chair is supercalifragleisticexpialidocious". Relaxed like a kitty in a windowsill! 😄💨 I'd venture to put this in the "one hitter quitter" category.”"
“love the stuff”

“Every time I go to the dispensary I always like to try something new. This was the first time I have never tried Great White Shark. Super Silver Haze has been my go to lately but Great White won my heart with the first couple of hits. It's a great high! You get a really nice head buzz and a bit of a body high. It has helped with my pain, depression, and seizures. If you have never tried Great White you NEED to give i...”

“This was recommended to me for anxiety and depression, I was hesitant at first, but this is a pleasantly surprising strain! I got it as a cartridge, only 1-2 hits and instant euphoria. It’s like taking an antidepressant or anti anxiety medication (minus taking a pill) 
I have to say that more than 2 hits made me feel sea sick. So a little of this goes a long way! Definitely a money saver in the long run because this ...”
“love the stuff”

“pretty bomb💯👌💨 when im curing my buds of GWS I would grab 3 plastic shopping bags one half filled with blueberries 2nd bag full of the buds then tie them up put them in the 3rd bag tie that up and throw it in the freezer for how ever long you like curing buds. I cure for 6 months. then when it's ready. your bud will smell bomb and will taste like blueberries. For me?? i like to call it Blueberry Jaws" and my dabs...”"
“It's a really clean high it's allot like purple kush except it gives you more energy and helps with pain.”
“this shark has some bite and then it turns into the u ok?" shark meme for a second and makes sure you're ok
column4: then takes you on a wild ride through the oceans of your mind.  excellent hybrid. +++”"

“What more can be said? Everything you need to know about this strain is in the name: White because the buds are literally some of the whitest shade of green you'll find compared to any other strain; Great because the strain is well, damn GREAT; and finally Shark because there are so many amazing strains out there that this one definitely needed to be recognized as a top-dog and fine competitor for the position as an ...”

“Got some shake to sample from AZCPC. It was a little ugly, and not much taste. And the euphoria was low. But!! Did a nice number of relieving pain from a Toothache thats been bothering me, and also did well for my arthritis and back pain muscle & spinal". Also was really smooth to smoke
column4: and leafy! Got COPD? You might be happy with this! Shoulda rolled one with it
column5: and I will next chance I get. Had a nice mixture of...”"

column3: “What a great looking strain and it smokes as smooth as it looks, great for kicking back on a hammock and melting away”

“This is one of the most potent strains in my opinion. I have been dabbing for a long time & haven't found anything else that's a one hit wonder.
GWS is also a strain that gives you a nice strong body buzz. It makes me feel energized and motivated”

“Absolutely phenomenal strain. I know there's a lot of strains & a lot of people saying they should try certain ones. But DO NOT pass a chance up to get this strain, especially in concentrate form. This strain shows it's potency right after the first hit. 
It does have an indica body buzz to it, but it didn't make me tired. I've smoked this in the evening when I was looking to combat fatigue.
Taste 5/5 Sweet dank tast...”

“Acheter à la SQDC. Qualités exceptionnelles, odeure pas mal et un goût plus qu'endurable. Vous serez rapidement frappé d'une sensation de bien-être physique et d'une bonne humeur psychologique. Les pensées resteront assez claires et la motivation probablement amélioré. Excellent pour l'anxiété et la dépression ainsi que les douleurs physiques, tout ça sans nécessairement vous traîner de force dans votre lit.”

“I have a white shark-green crack combo so they are OD sativa buds, which I think is dope. Two of the hardest hitting sativas in one strain. Fast-thinking, conversational effects. The taste really accentuates the dry mouth. It smells very citrusy with a combination of wood and earth scents. It's crystally as a powdered donut, and it's fluffy yet dense.”
“love the stuff”
“Hits the body good at first and then give it awhile and you'll feel it in your head. Its good stuff for night time. Pretty heavy.”

“One of my all time favorites. Smoked it many times. Very strong almost onioney mixed with grapefruit smell. Taste great delivering a insanely fast acting cerebral head rush. Leaves you feeling great with an instant mood boost. Can sit you down if youre not an experienced smoker. A well rounded strain that has the ability to fulfill many purposes. Buds  ive had almost always very dense round spear like nugs. Mild gree...”

“I got this at Tokyo Starfishin Bend Oregon along with two other strains of flowers. I absolutely loved the body high with this the best. It relaxes me without knocking me out and I was able to enjoy the evening. The bud tender, Troy has been so helpful each time I've talked with him and all of the people at Tokyo Starfish have been awesome. They have a great selection for your needs and the products are so fresh and ...”

“This flower smells amazing, and my buds were glistening, but it did not deliver the punch I was expecting. While it did reduce my anxiety and gave me a nice euphoria, it did not last long. I also got a mild headache. My intuition tells me that it may not be a great strain for me, and that's okay. It may be an excellent strain for someone else, it certainly looks and smells like an excellent strain.”

“First thing noticed off the Standard Farms Cart is your body wanting to lay back and just chill. Your body moves so much slower like it’s in marmalade. You can hear music differently notes come out that weren’t heard before. I notice a more attentive feeling guess it’s good for ADD. Also feel mentally relaxed but not in a heavy or tired way it’s a stress free chill way. Happy not overly happy but like normal haha so ...”

“I’m not sure where the sativa comes in, maybe from the focus..? Aside from daydreaming under the guise of blacked-out unconsciousness don’t expect to go anywhere. I realized how much I appreciate the strength in my hands, and my neck now lol. If you’re in search of solitude and the ability to work you imaginative muscles; without the burden of moving your body suit up and burn a bowl or two. But again def don’t expec...”

“One of my all time favorites. Smoked it many times. Very strong almost onioney mixed with grapefruit smell. Taste great delivering a insanely fast acting cerebral head rush. Buds  ive had almost always very dense round spear like nugs. Mild gree...”
“One of my top 3 favorite strains. It never punches you in the face with the high. Every single time it comes in nice and smooth! Nice smooth smoke as well 👍🏼👍🏼”
“This was a mindbender..”
“I am high on it right now and I would say it is such a happy high!!!! Very sativa!!!! My body feels really heavy”
“A.K.A TRAINWRECK!! Dude this side some serious bud.”
“Great vanilla like strain , strong distinct novelty like smell but the strain is potent. Two grams from swell and I will most likely remember this strong and flavorful bud for awhile.”
“wow I love this heady uplifting strain it very much surprised me alot.”
“this product gave me energy but at the same time it made me so relaxed I took a nap with my eyes still open”

“We’ve grown this strain 3 times because of how wonderful it is! I have EDS, bipolar disorder, anxiety, insomnia, PTSD, & have chronic pain from scoliosis & arthritis - this strain covers all my symptoms. It has been literally a lifesaver for me, & I cant recommend this strain enough!”
“Killer strain! Clean smoke and tastes amazing. Would definitely recommend trying.”
“It may be a sativa, but it ends up putting me to sleep most of the time. Such a strong head buzz, but doesn't give me a headache like most Sativas. Prepare to chill the fuck out.”
“This one will surprise you. Great White Shark is sativa which will delight you with its citrus earthy taste. High is strong first cerebral then physical. You wont regret the trip fam ;)”
“It may be a sativa, but it ends up putting me to sleep most of the time. Such a strong head buzz, but doesn't give me a headache like most Sativas. Prepare to chill the fuck out.”

“A.K.A TRAINWRECK!! Dude this side some serious bud.”

“This strain doesn't come on strong, but creeps up on you. Very relaxing to the mind and body, relief of pain with a bit of a psychedelic effect. For me it puts me to sleep, and every time I've smoked it I have strange and vivid dreams. Definitely would get it again.”
“One of my top 3 favorite strains. It never punches you in the face with the high. Every single time it comes in nice and smooth! Nice smooth smoke as well 👍🏼👍🏼”

“Great White Shark with CBD (12%)  from San Rafael bought at the SQDC. I’m very sensitive to THC but for some reason this strain was great - as long as I didn’t smoke too much. This helps with BPD - the intrusive thoughts become much less important and my mind is able to concentrate ...”

This is my second time ever smoking/dabbing this strain and the first time was a heavy body buzz that lasted a few hours.
GW...”

“This strain was an interesting one for me. Delivered a very potent energy but gave me a hefty crash in energy about an hour later.

However, I will say the hour is pretty pleasant. For me it was a productive energy, not so much a 'socializing' feeling.

The smell is also very interesting, I'd argue it smells very funky and cheesy. An almost offensive smell but it makes you want to smell it again.

Overall, this isn't...”
“I honestly love this strain for when it comes to just chilling out and listening to podcasts to lull into sleep.”

“First time Ive had this strain and it has to go in my top ten for sure! The buds are covered in white resin and gives off a citrus smell but with a deep earthy undertone to it. It gives you a real body high so is great for pain relief. Definatly recommend this strain!”

“Very fruity smell with a little bit of floweriness to it. Really good buds with a lot of orange hairs on it, and really white as well. “It makes my body feel high in the first stage. And then after a bit the second stage hits and your mind is high. Very good for nightimes but not so good to actually do stuff in daytime.”

“This one is interesting to me... I really like the hybrid effects, great body high along with the balloon-for-a-head feeling of the sativa. REALLY energizing about 10-15 seconds after taking a few hits from the doobie. Ends up knocking me out after about 2 hours. Great strain for sunset into just before night time. Just be careful not to go too fast, this stuff is POTENT! Taste is nice, little fruity and earthy. Noth...”

“Great White Shark is an awesome strain that produces a very heavy body buzz which makes this sativa a great pain reliever! “Great for movie night if you can handle a stiff indica.”

“I was directed to this strain when my dispensary did not have Acapulco Gold.  I was told Great White Shark is great for pain.  This was the most disappointing strain ever.  Super dry nugs that fell apart when you touch them.  High lasted about 30 mins tops.  Nothing to write home about.  Not worth the money I gave away for this junk strain.”
“Is good is yerba?”

“Like I've seen in other reviews, this strain hits fast - I found it quite strong.  Fairly decent body buzz for a sativa, which becomes  more apparent as time passes. When I'm high my vision usually gets a little blurry, and I noticed it waaay more with GWS than with others, probably due to its muscle relaxing properties. The only reason  I dont give it five stars is due to what I found to be slightly  thick and harsh...”

“Smell and taste were phenomenal, like tropical punch candy. I immediately felt a positive, energetic high. I suddenly wanted to do things outside and go to new places. I usually feel paranoid when I smoke sativas. Not so this time. The stimulating buzz only lasted for about a half hour though.”

“My whole back is blocked and the doctor gave me the whole week off, picked this up and smoked two fat joints back to back. “Real nice high with a good relaxed cerebral feel, but short-lived. The good part of the high is over in half an hour. Comedown is unremarkable. Would be a good session smoke.”
“One of my absolute favorites. I feel that this strain is a bit underrated - when grown properly it has a great combo of body shot/creativity. Very fun.”

“When this strain is grown properly, it is primarily white in colour with a lime green accent, it has lengthy amber hairs that obnoxiously stretch throughout the bud reaching a good amount of area. Your eyes fixate on the abundance of trichome as the indubitable aesthetic quality of this strain. A nice whiff gives an inviting smell with a certain sweetness to it. When you break into the bud and squeeze it a bit this s...”
“My second favorite strain after Cali kush. Great to sit back, relax, and forget about the day.”
“nice head high.”
“Very happy high. Kicks in fast. Only three stars because it didn't last as long as I would like and after long usage effects don't really work as well.”
“This is my go to before bed flower. Instant body buzz then relaxation. Head clearing.”

“Find it in La Grande Oregon at
Green Apothecary 1709 Adams”

“Wow what a powerhouse. This is a perfect strain for pain, as noted many times before about this particular bud. I highly recommend it for people suffering from chronic pain or a painful injury. It works fast and is quite potent.”
“Good”

“Great sativa, to keep you mind happy and motivated, body energized, and all around feeling right!  I wouldn't say it made me feel dizzy but definitely felt the head high.  GWS is a Great one for a weekend adventure.”
“Nice uplifting, but relaxing high👌🏽”

“Great White Shark is a nice sativa dominant strain
that is also known for showcasing a mildy heavy,
indica body buzz.
Frosty nugs, mid to high density with thick cone structure.
4/5”

“Tastes a tiny bit chemically in my opinion, but also like citrus. Once it hits, you really wanna go relax somewhere really comfy or visit a sauna or something. I feel very peaceful with life as well. This would probably be a wonderful strain for...”
“good for cleaning the house.”
“Gave me a mellow high. Smoked it at around 11:30pm. Gave me a great high!!!”

“I really enjoyed the smell,
 and the taste had that perfect, not to sour, citrus taste.
Got very very energetic and happy, perfect for depression and/or feeling apathetic.

its a keeper”
“This strain is great for day smoking and focusing on chores. This is a pleasant  easy, breezy strain that is very soothing for anxiety and has helped my chronic GERD big time.”
“I was pleasantly surprised by the Indica effect of this Sativa strain. I would recommend it to anyone that is in need of pain management. I helped me sleep, completely, through the night.”
“Wenn perfekt fermentieren nach der ein Monat Ernte, und geduldig dann ist unglaublich so schwer beim Rauchen und Geschmack ist wie frische Gras im Sommer. GWS macht gute Nacht schlafen.”

“GWS came on fast and strong, smells of pungent earth. Nice crystals all over. No couch locked for me, just a nice body buzz and a euphoric head high..

“This is really great to do with friends. The buzz really did sudden hit me really hard and I ended up passing out a few hours later. It was a really good experience overall”
“Great for pain!”
“This is the best strain if you want to have a nice chill time with friends very nice taste and it get me a big smile on my face when I smoke it with havy relaxion but still energetic I love It !😍”

“Not usually a fan of sativas bit this one is special. It is beautiful, I got a AAAA strain and was sad breaking it up. the smoke was perfect nothing to caugh about. the high felt fresh and clean with the anxiety. I would recommend this strain to everyone. it's worth the money.”

“I was expecting a good energetic sativa high, but it was the complete opposite for me. I had GWS shatter and loaded it into my Kandypen and took a couple of good puffs. “I really love this strains smell and appeal. it's earthy & citrusy combination flavor/smell is a treat.  Easy and smooth on the lungs, especially in my bubbler. It creeps up on you , be ready lol.  Overall I really enjoyed it,  hope u do too!”
“love this strain,good taste and great high.”

“good bud not the best looking from what i purchased but im willing to bet it could look better if grown better. color is  light green with very light colored red/orange hairs. not to much on the sparkly side. the bud i picked up is an outdoor WS and has the out doors taste not much to rave about. after smoking one fatty of WS i went about some errands and i have to say that the high kicked in nice , i was surprized a...”
“This hit me really quickly, definitely more for relaxing than working. The body buzz is heavy and the next day I just relaxed in bed”
“Smooth, smells & tastes fantastic, great smoke!”
“really dank and hits super hard. has interesting smell”

“For me it didn't hit hard. At first. 
After about 30 minutes. I was knocked on my ass! Highly recommend”
“One of the many amazing white strains that you can never find but once you do you want more cause it's so potent & has that old school skunk smell!”

“great white packs an initial punch that makes me giggly and smiley... not even cheesey but just on the ticklish edge of enjoyment. dark to bright green medium density nuggets with light odor. Has a sweet, yet very sour smell, with an icey thunderfuck undertone, melded with a light touch of skunk. great to throw into your normal rotation for something a little different. Very clear for an indica, quite potent.”
“Good yield on sog. Resistant. Dense red haired hybrid. Great to grow but really doesnt get you high if you've gone to seed as I have.”

“This strain is a quality sativa. Got a rush of energy when smoking this. This strain was great for pretty much everything. After smoking this strain i felt happyness wash over me. Great bud, great price, could not be more happy with this purchase.”
